Name: [Affinity] Solid Companionship
Desc: In specific areas of Hollow Zero, there's a chance to trigger special events for agents in the squad, activating specific Mindscapes for the Agent for the current round.
Desc2: When Zhu Yuan confronts dangers and perils, she is never alone â€” Somewhere beyond her sight, numerous fellow officers stride alongside her. This camaraderie is the source of her confidence and pride as a Public Security officer.
